dialogues.name: Hero
dialogues.dialogueText: The world needs me! My princess needs me!

dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: Please Bart!! Save the Kingdom! For me!!

dialogues.name: Hero
dialogues.dialogueText: I would curse those men who poisoned your father!!

dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: Maybe we can talk to the High Sparrow...
